ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can water-packed tart red pitted cherries, drained
des: "Reach for cans: In a large skillet, heat canned tart cherries and cherry pie filling with frozen apple juice concentrate and some brandy. Add a bit more brandy (for a really good show, dim the lights on the way to the table) and ignite with a long wooden match. Voila -- Easy Cherries Jubilee."
ins:
Bring pie filling, cherries and concentrate to simmer in a 12-inch skillet. Add 1/2 cup of the brandy; simmer to blend and concentrate flavors, 3 to 5 minutes. Remove from heat.
Stir in almond extract; pour in remaining brandy. Carefully ignite to burn off alcohol.
In each of eight bowls, put 1/2 cup scoop of ice cream; spoon sauce over ice cream. Serve.
